channel.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

No no no no no no
if you put
client plr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[0];
It wants to know what 0 is. So by putting int Player = 0 i am telling it what player is XD although i am sure that that is what is wrong.
return false and return true mean whether it is aggressive or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

int Player = 0;
client plr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

is the same as

client plr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[0];

which is your problem I’m guessing.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if (plr.combatLevel <= 20) { return true; } else if (plr.combatLevel > 20) { return false; }

What’s returning true and false?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Hi i am using deltascape and i added this code to my npcs gets annoyed code and it works fine compiled but if you walk near this npc the game just explodes heres the code

int Player = 0; client plr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; if (npcs[Npc].npcType == 73) { if (plr.combatLevel <= 20) { return true; } else if (plr.combatLevel > 20) { return false; } }
Tell me if you know whats wrong

Read full topic
